_header: O woeful heart forecast with heaviness
_description: Charles d’Orléans, The Tormented Lover — three stanzas rhyme royal and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
O Woofull hert forcast with heuynesForto ben draynt in teeris feele
                    þat rayne…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Als flex to moche doth Cloto to [hit] reccheO onys with deth
                    almes me poore wrecche
